titles.title: Mitigating Investor Risk Act of 2023
Mitigating Investor Risk Act of 2023
To require the Secretary of the Treasury to conduct a study and submit a report on certain risks to United States investors in the event of hostilities in Taiwan or the Taiwan Strait.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

bill.summary:
Mitigating Investor Risk Act of 2023
This bill requires the Department of the Treasury to (1) report on the risks posed to U.S. investors by investments in Chinese companies in the event of hostilities in Taiwan or the Taiwan Strait, and (2) make any recommendations for mitigating this risk.
